name: lurkers.io
summary:
lurkers.io is a multiplayer HTML5 game about surviving the zombie apocalypse, and much more. There are a bunch of different gamemodes in the creation such as roleplay, deathmatch, sandbox, stranded and more. In addition you can start your own server and script your very own gamemodes. Unleash the nerdiness within you! 
 
• Website: http://lurkers.io/index.html 
• Or why not play it right now: http://lurkers.io/client/latest/index.html?host=3.104.25.208&nickname=tigsource 
 
Expect bugs, this game is still being built, but you are welcome to give it a try, join our Discord channel and yell at me when everything breaks! Beer!
